tha-ap489:8.4: etamatthaṃ pucchiṃsu maṃ → etamatthamapucchu maṃ (bj) | etamatthaṃ apucchisuṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | etamatthaṃ apucchiṃsu (mr)
tha-ap489:9.1: Pulinena → puḷinena (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed), kato thūpo → kate thūpe (bj)
tha-ap489:10.1: Niddiṭṭhā nu → niddiṭṭhā no (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | diṭṭhā no vo (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap489:19.2: atulā ca → atulyā ca (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | te (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
tha-ap489:27.2: byādhinā → vyādhito (bj) | byādhiko (sya1ed, sya2ed) | byādhito (pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
